modName: Tame The Beasts of Skyrim Addon - Wild Horses
summary:
Addon For Tame The Beasts of Skyrim

- 250+ respawning handplaced horses for you to tame!
- TWO new stand alone horse types which are also scattered across the world for you to tame!
descriptionHtml:
Tame The Beasts of Skyrim Addon - Wild Horses
By: TheSkoomaKing & Hfiani
Requires:
[color=red]Dawnguard[/color]
[color=green]Tame The beasts of Skyrim[/color]
Newest Version of Skyrim

as stated by the name this is an addon for [color=yellow]Tame The Beasts of Skyrim[/color] found here on the nexus:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28944/] Tame The Beasts of Skyrim [/url]



Description:

- This mod adds wild horses all around skyrim! with more than 250+ respawning handplaced horses for you to tame! This includes ALL vanilla added horses from skyrim!

- Adds TWO new stand alone horse types which are also scattered across the world for you to tame!

- The Horses are never alone and are often in numbers between 2-7 horses a herd.

- Wild horses will run away if an enemy is near, and that includes the player

- the horses will TRY to stay together, but will do their best to survive, which means that if they 
are attacked and cannot stay together they will run seperatly and if they manage to escape they will regroup 
as soon as the threat is gone.


- Wild horses are easiest to find near small lakes, high grass locations, and forests. as they are searching
for a safe enviroment with lots of food and water

[img]http://www.fildirekt.se/dl/1363927922.jpg[/img]


Credits:

AlienSlofs - For his Horse textures which I retextured, thanks!

Bethesda for their wonderful game and creation kit!

Me and HFiani who created Tame The Beasts of Skyrim!
author: TheSkoomaKing and Hfiani
